QuestData.Title: Mission Complete
QuestData.Description: We be done here, mon. Only thing left to do is send a report to Okrilla. You doin' anything right now?
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Nethergarde Mine Report to Okrilla at Dreadmaul Hold in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: <Okrilla glances over the report.>$b$bImpressive, $n. I wouldn't have hidden in that box, but otherwise, you have performed bravely and admirably. The battle we won today may not win us any immediate spoils, but the damage you've done to the Alliance will last for a long time.
